## Conversation that answers the provided questions:
**User:**
Hi, I'm trying to get started with Verus Desktop and I was wondering, what version should I download to access the Vault and Marketplace interfaces?

**AI Assistant:**
You'll want to download version v0.9.0-4 of Verus Desktop to access the Vault and Marketplace interfaces. That's the correct version for those features.

**User:**
Okay, got it! By the way, I've been meaning to catch up on some marketing meetings. How many were uploaded to the Verus YouTube channel this month?

**AI Assistant:**
Four marketing meetings were uploaded to the Verus YouTube channel this month. You should be able to find them all there.

**User:**
Thanks for the help! Just out of curiosity, what's the current year according to the Verus community?

**AI Assistant:**
According to the Verus community, the current year is 2022.
What version of Verus Desktop should I download to access the Vault and Marketplace interfaces?
You should download version v0.9.0-4 of Verus Desktop to access the Vault and Marketplace interfaces.

Verus Desktop with Vault and Marketplace Interfaces
Verus Desktop now supports Vault and Marketplace with interfaces. Anyone can lock up their funds in a VerusID with Vault, or make and take offers on VerusIDs. Download the latest version v0.9.0–4 here.
Community Videos and Audio
This month four marketing meetings were uploaded to the Verus YouTube channel.
Listen to this one where Mike Toutonghi talks about everything Verus.
Listen to community member Consilience (Nicholas Lyons) speak on Clubhouse. (only available when you have the app on your phone)
🎆 Happy New Year! 🎆
Best wishes to all the Verus community for a great 2021, and an even better 2022! A lot has been accomplished already, and in the new year we will keep on growing and keep on building momentum!
Please subscribe to the monthly recap so you’ll get it each month in your mailbox.
